quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Tattooed
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, kind. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What kind of fake tattoo did Leonardo DiCaprio get on his shoulder for his role in the 2000 movie The Beach?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Scratches

questions.question: What child actor starred alongside Charlie Chaplin as his adopted son and sidekick in the 1921 silent dramedy movie The Kid?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jackie Coogan

questions.question: What insect did actress Jessica Alba get tattooed on the back of her neck?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A ladybug

questions.question: What phrase did singer and actress Hilary Duff get tattooed on her right foot?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Let it be

questions.question: What kind of tattoo did actress Susan Sarandon get on her upper back?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: her childrens initials

questions.question: What number did Penelope Cruz get tattooed on her right ankle?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 883

questions.question: Mark Margolis plays a Connecticut soldier in this 1989 movie about an all black regiment in the Civil War.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Glory

questions.question: What is the name of the dog from Charlie Chaplins silent movie A Dogs Life from 1918?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Scraps

questions.question: What kind of tattoo did Mariah Carey get on her lower back?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A butterfly

questions.question: What word did actor Frankie Muniz (Malcolm in the Middle) get tattooed on his arm?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Zero

questions.question: On what part of her body did Rihanna get a tattoo reading Love?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Finger

questions.question: Mark Margolis played Fajngold in this movie about the Holocaust.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jakob the Liar

questions.question: On what part of her body did actress Charlize Theron have a fish tattooed?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ankle

questions.question: What letter did actor Kurt Russell get tattooed on his leg?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: G

questions.question: Mark Margolis plays Alberto the Shadow in the 1983 movie Scarface. Why does Al Pacinos character kill Alberto in this movie?

options.text: So Tony Monyana can gain more drug territory
So he cannot kill a child
Because Margolis character tries to arrest him
So Margolis character can not testify against him at trial

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: So he cannot kill a child
